tool.name: Regression Analysis (Points and Predictor Grid)
tool.description: Regression analysis of point attributes with a grid as predictor. The regression function is used to create a new grid with regression based values. <br/><br/>Reference:<br/>- Bahrenberg, G., Giese, E., Nipper, J. (1990): 'Statistische Methoden in der Geographie 1 - Univariate und bivariate Statistik', Stuttgart, 233p.<br/>
